downloadDescription: Technical article about sockets programming in .NET Micro Framework
detailsSection:
Support for this product is no longer available from Microsoft, please refer to http://www.netmf.com/forum/ for assistance.

With .NET Micro Framework v2.5, it's easier than ever for devices to support TCP/IP networking. This article will get you started writing your own network clients and servers for the .NET Micro Framework.
installInstructionSection: This article may open in your browser. If it does not, download it to an appropriate folder and double-click it to view in Acrobat Reader.
